original_text: If I had died at birth, I would now be resting in peace. If I had died at birth, I would now be resting in peace.
korean_text: 그렇지 아니하였던들 이제는 내가 평안히 누워서 자고 쉬었을 것이니

sentences.original_text: If I had died at birth
I would now be resting in peace
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 지금 평안히 쉬고 있을 것입니다
